Class-Champion 20 -- Female Skilled Human Champion: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +4
Background: Gambler Deity: Nethys
Experience: 19061/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Blessed Swiftness: +5 Speed

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Auspicious Mount: Mount is a specialized animal companion with celestial, fiend, or monitor trait, +2 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom, Skill Expert (Religion), ability to speak the language of Nethys's servitors, flight, +30 Hit Points, and, as appropriate, holy or unholy trait with +5 Hit Points and weakness 5 to the opposing trait
Blessing Of The Devoted: 2 selections
Champion Feats: 11 selections
Champion Key Attribute: 1 selection
Deity: Has the Anathema and Sanctification features
Desecration: Has the Selfish Shield feature
Divine Ally: +1
General Feats: 5 selections
Grandeur: Has the Flash Of Grandeur feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Iniquity: Has the Destructive Vengeance feature
Justice: Has the Retributive Strike feature
Liberation: Has the Liberating Step feature
Obedience: Has the Iron Command feature
Redemption: Has the Glimpse Of Redemption feature
Sanctification: 1 selection
Second Blessing: +1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Elf): May take Elf ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by Nethys
Cause: 1 selection
Champion's Aura: 15' aura can be detected by followers of Nethys and can be suppressed or resumed with 1 action
Desecration: Must subvert all that is pure and holy
Faithful Steed: Has a young animal companion as a mount
Grandeur: Must provide a shining example for others
Imposing Destrier: Mount is a nimble or savage animal companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Iniquity: Must destroy and take advantage of others
Justice: Must follow the law and respect legitimate authorities
Liberation: Must respect others' freedom and oppose tyranny
Loyal Warhorse: Mount is mature and will never attack self
Obedience: Must enforce proper hierarchies and lead when appropriate
Redemption: Must always show compassion for others and attempt to redeem the wicked
Perception: +27 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Academia Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Midwifery Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +26 (charisma; trained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Alcohol Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Driving Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Nature: +25 (wisdom; trained)
Aquatic Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Dwarven Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +26 (intelligence; trained) Elven Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Performance: +4 (charisma; untrained)
Arctic Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Fortune-Telling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +27 (wisdom; expert)
Astral Plane Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Games Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Astronomy Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +4 (charisma; untrained) Stealth: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; untrained) Library Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Boneyard Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Lizardfolk Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +28 (intelligence; expert) Medicine: +3 (wisdom; untrained) Vampire Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary)
Languages: Cnthonian; Common; Empyrean; Halfling; Necril; Sussuran
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Driving Lore): Skill Legendary (Driving Lore)
Additional Lore (Vampire Lore): Skill Legendary (Vampire Lore)
Champion Skills: Skill Trained (Religion; Choose 6 from any)
Deity And Cause: Arcana
Deity: Skill Trained (Arcana)
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Astral Plane Lore): Skill Trained (Astral Plane Lore)
Skill Training (Elven Lore): Skill Trained (Elven Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Lengthy Diversion: Can remain hidden after a Create A Diversion attempt critically succeeds
Lie To Me: Can use Deception to detect lies in a conversation
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead; may target hidden allies with a DC 5 flat check
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge with on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 43 (dexterity (1 max); legendary) Class DC: Champion: 40 (strength; master)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Battle Axe (+30 1d8+4 S; strength; master); Gauntlet (+30 1d4+4 B; strength; master); Ranseur (+30 1d10+4 P; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Champion Expertise: Class Expert (Champion)
Champion Mastery: Class Master (Champion)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Deific Weapon: Staff inflicts +1 damage die step
Deity: Attack Trained (Staff)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Legendary Armor: Defense Legendary (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Shield Paragon: Shield is always raised and is automatically remade after 1 day if destroyed
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Battle Axe): Weapon Familiarity (Battle Axe)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Proficiency (Whip Claw): Attack Expert (Whip Claw)
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Aura Of Despair: Foes within aura suffer -1 save vs. fear and cannot remove frightened condition
Aura Of Faith: Strikes by allies within aura gain the holy or unholy trait
Blessed Armament: Can apply a choice of fearsome, vitalizing, ghost touch, returning, or shifting to a chosen weapon during daily prep, and critical hits inflict its critical specialization effect
Blessed Counterstrike: (1) Strike after Champion's Reaction gains 1 extra damage die and inflicts weakness 10 to Strikes by self and allies for 1 rd
Blessed Swiftness: Ally moving within aura gains +2 defense vs. reactions
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Brilliant Flash: Flash Of Grandeur inflicts off-guard for 1 rd
Defensive Advance: (2) Uses Raise A Shield, Strides, and then makes a melee Strike
Deific Weapon: Has access to staff
Destructive Vengeance: (R) Attack on self inflicts an additional 6 and an equal amount of spirit damage on attacker, and self Strikes on attacker inflict +6 HP spirit until the end of the next turn
Divine Reflexes: Can use an additional reaction for Champion's Reaction once per turn
Divine Wall: Adjacent spaces are difficult terrain for foes
Dragonslayer Oath: Retributive Strike inflicts +4 HP damage, or +6 HP with master proficiency,
Exalted Reaction (Desecration): Selfish Shield inflicts -1 on foe attacks on self from within aura
Exalted Reaction (Grandeur): Flash Of Grandeur inflicts Revealing Light on all foes within aura
Exalted Reaction (Iniquity): Destructive Vengeance also inflicts half its damage on other foes within aura
Exalted Reaction (Justice): Retributive Strike allows allies within aura to use a reaction to make a -5 melee Strike against the target
Exalted Reaction (Liberation): Liberating Step allows self and all allies within aura to Step
Exalted Reaction (Obedience): Iron Command also inflicts 6 HP mental on other foes within aura who refuse to kneel
Exalted Reaction (Redemption): Can use Glimpse Of Redemption to give allies resistance 20 to all damage
Fiendsbane Oath: Retributive Strike inflicts +4 HP damage, or +6 HP with master proficiency,
Flash Of Grandeur: (R) Gives an ally within aura resistance 22 to triggering damage and inflicts Revealing Light on attacker for 1 rd
Glimpse Of Redemption: (R) Forces a foe who has damaged an ally within aura to choose between negating the damage or giving the ally resistance 22 to all damage and suffering enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn
Greater Security: Can give an ally full shield AC bonus and use Shield Block to benefit them
Gruesome Strike: (1) Champion's Reaction Strike inflicts double extra damage and drained 1 (save Fortitude negates drained)
Instrument Of Slaughter: Champion's Reaction that inflicts extra damage also inflicts persistent bleed damage equal to 2 damage dice
Instrument Of Zeal: Critical hit with Blessed Counterstrike or Retributive Strike inflicts an additional damage die and slowed 1 for 1 rd
Iron Command: (R) Triggering foe suffers its choice of kneeling or 6d6 HP mental, and self Strikes vs. that foe inflict +3 HP spirit until the end of the next turn
Liberating Step: (R) Gives an ally within aura resistance 22 to any triggering damage and free actions to Escape or to save from a restraint and to Step
Nimble Reprisal: Can make a Retributive Strike using a ranged Strike or a Step and a melee Strike
Ongoing Selfishness: Selfish Shield gives half resistance to all damage from the triggering foe until the end of the turn
Quick Shield Block: Can use an additional reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Radiant Armament: Can choose astral, brilliant, holy, or unholy rune for Blessed Armament, and can use a 10-min activity to change the rune
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Relentless Reaction (Desecration): Has increased Selfish Shield effects
Relentless Reaction (Grandeur): Flash Of Grandeur also inflicts 4 HP spirit on attacker, unrecoverable while affected by Revealing Light
Relentless Reaction (Iniquity): Destructive Vengeance also inflicts 4 HP persistent spirit
Relentless Reaction (Justice): Retributive Strike also inflicts 4 HP persistent spirit
Relentless Reaction (Liberation): Liberating Step also inflicts 4 HP persistent spirit on triggering foe who was restraining ally
Relentless Reaction (Obedience): Iron Command also inflicts 4 HP persistent spirit on a foe who refuses to kneel
Relentless Reaction (Redemption): Glimpse Of Redemption also inflicts 4 HP spirit on an attacker who refuses to repent
Retributive Strike: (R) Gives an ally within aura damaged by an attack resistance 22 to all damage and allows self to make a melee Strike against the attacking foe if within reach
Selfish Shield: (R) Gives resistance 14 to triggering damage, and Strikes against the triggering foe inflict +3 HP spirit for 1 rd
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Shield Of Grace: May redirect half of the excess damage to self when using Shield Block to protect an ally
Shield Of Reckoning: (R) Uses Shield Block on an ally and Champion's Reaction on the attacking foe
Shield Warden: Can use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shining Oath: Retributive Strike inflicts +4 HP damage, or +6 HP with master proficiency,
Swift Paragon: Has an additional action each rd to Step or Stride, and aura allows allies to move without triggering reactions
Swift Retribution: Using Champion's Reaction makes self quickened for 1 rd
Unimpeded Step: Liberating Step target may Step normally in any terrain
Vicious Vengeance: Destructive Vengeance inflicts additional damage on foe equal to the number of damage dice
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Weight Of Guilt: Can make a Glimpse Of Redemption target stupefied instead of enfeebled
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +29 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Divine Will: Save Master (Will)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Sacred Body: Save Master (Fortitude)
Aura Of Courage: Reduces the initial value of any frightened condition by 1, and reduction of a frightened condition at the end of a turn also reduces the fright of allies within aura
Aura Of Determination: Aura gives +1 vs. mental, morph, and polymorph
Aura Of Life: Aura gives resistance 5 to void energy and +1 saves vs. void
Aura Of Righteousness: Aura gives resistance 5 to unholy and attempts counteract to counteract teleportation affecting unholy creatures
Divine Grace: (R) Gives +2 vs. the triggering spell
Divine Health: +2 vs. diseases and poisons and on flat checks to recover from persistent poison, and successes vs. disease or poison are critical successes; allies within aura gain a +1 bonus
Divine Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Sacred Body: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Sacred Defender: Has resistance 5 to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing, and resistance 10 to these vs. holy or unholy creatures as appropriate/Natural 20 by foe does not improve success degree
Stubborn Persistence: Successful DC 17 flat check negates becoming fatigued
Magic
Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane Innate: +26 (charisma; trained); Divine: +30 (charisma; master) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 36 (charisma; trained); Divine: 40 (charisma; master)
Spells:
Champion's Sacrifice (D6 Foc): (R) R30' Redirects the damage of the triggering Strike or failed save from an ally to self
Detect Magic (AC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Hero's Defiance (D10 Foc): (F) Self recovers 6d8+20 HP before suffering damage that would reduce HP to 0 once per Refocus
Know The Enemy (D4 Foc): (R) Allows a Recall Knowledge check, using the better of 2 rolls, during initiative or immediately after inflicting damage to remember a target's abilities
Lay On Hands (D1 Foc): (1) Touched regains 6 HP and gains +2 Armor Class for 1 rd; touched undead instead suffers 1d6 HP and -2 Armor Class for 1 rd (save basic Fortitude also negates -2 Armor Class) (heightened +1 restores +6 HP or inflicts +1d6 HP)
Shields Of The Spirit (D1 Foc): (1) While shield is raised, self aura gives allies +1 Armor Class and inflicts 1d4 HP spirit on attacking foes for 1 rd (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Touch Of The Void (D1 Foc): (1) Touched undead regains 6 HP and gains +2 Armor Class for 1 rd; touched living instead suffers 1d6 HP and -2 Armor Class for 1 rd (save basic Fortitude also negates -2 Armor Class) (heightened +1 restores +6 HP or inflicts +1d6 HP)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Deity's Domain (Knowledge): Knows the Know The Enemy divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Affliction Mercy: Has increased Mercy effects
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st rank at will
Champion Expertise: Spell Expert (Divine)
Champion Mastery: Spell Master (Divine)
Champion's Sacrifice: Knows the Champion's Sacrifice divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Devotion Spells: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Greater Mercy: Has increased Mercy effects
Hero's Defiance: Knows the Hero's Defiance divine spell
Spectral Advance: Knows the Spectral Advance divine focus spell/+1 Focus Points
Cruelty: Using 2 actions to cast Touch Of The Void also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 min on a failed save, or enfeebled 2 on a critical failure
Deity: Has access to Force Barrage, Embed Message, Levitate, Flicker, Telekinetic Haul, Wall Of Force, Warp Mind, Quandary, and Detonate Magic spells
Desperate Prayer: (F) Gains 1 Focus Spell to cast a devotion spell by the end of the turn
Devoted Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Expand Aura: (1) Extends Champion's Aura to 30' until Dismissed
Greater Cruelty: Can use Cruelty to make the target clumsy or stupefied instead
Heal Mount: Lay On Hands cast on mount restores 10 HP + 10 HP per heightened level
Iron Repercussions: Iron Command can inflict persistent mental damage
Mercy (Body): Using 2 actions to cast Lay On Hands can also attempt to counteract stunned, drained, slowed, blinded, dazzled, deafened, enfeebled, or sickened
Mercy (Grace): Using 2 actions to cast Lay On Hands can also attempt to counteract petrified, stunned, immobilized, restrained, slowed, clumsy, grabbed, or paralyzed
Mercy (Mind): Using 2 actions to cast Lay On Hands can also attempt to counteract doomed, stunned, confused, controlled,slowed, fleeing, frightened, or stupefied
Rejuvenating Touch: Lay On Hands gives 10 temporary Hit Points, lasting 1 rd, each rd for 10 rd
Security: Using 2 actions to cast Shields Of The Spirit gives 1 ally the benefits of the spell for 1 min
Ultimate Mercy: Can use Lay On Hands to restore life with 1 Hit Point and wounded 1 to a target who died in the previous rd
Notes
Validation Errors:
Champion Blessing Of The Devoted Allocation: 2 available vs. 3 allocated
Champion Cause Allocation: 0 available vs. 7 allocated
Champion Sanctification Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Champion's Sacrifice Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 12 and unholy feature (currently 1) == 0
Class Feats Allocation: 12 available vs. 57 allocated
Shield Of Reckoning Feat: Requires blessed shield feature (currently 1), level (currently 20) >= 10, champion's reaction feature (currently 1), shield ally feature, the tenets of good feature and shield warden feature (currently 1)
